Name: Divine Intervention
Story Background: When the forces of evil seemed insurmountable, the champions of righteousness called upon the divine to intervene and turn the tide of battle in their favor.
Ability: Exile all nonland permanents. For each permanent exiled this way, its controller may search their library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Appearance Description: An ethereal beam of radiant light descends from the heavens, enveloping the battlefield and lifting all non-angelic entities into the air, carrying them away in its divine embrace.
